name: XZ
description:
Having escaped from the “Death Island”, a group of the survived people resumes their struggle for life. Your mission is to reach the military base where you hope to be safe.

Particular features of the game:
  • approximately 2 hours of fighting for life.
  • original fight mechanics.
  • numerous classes of weapons and outfit.
  • new parameters of the characters (strength, endurance, etc.).
  • free movement on the world map.
